About Me

I thrive in dynamic environments where innovation meets real-world impact. As a Teaching Assistant for Data Structures and VFX, I enjoy mentoring the next generation of engineers. My leadership and passion also extends outside the classroom as one of the students to portray the Leprechaun mascot at Notre Dame, where I even had the honor as serving as the first female to play the role at a football game in Notre Dame Stadium.

Travel Tracker

A location-based journaling web app built with React and Google Maps API. Users can document their travels, share comments, upload images, and connect with friends. The app leverages a Back4App database for seamless data management and collaboration.

React Google Maps API Back4App RESTful API JavaScript

README.ai

An innovative application designed to enhance reading engagement and accessibility for students. Built using JavaScript and Python, the tool integrates the ChatGPT API to provide real-time reading assistance and personalized support. The project features a user-friendly interface, designed in Figma, and incorporates user feedback to ensure accessibility.

angular mongo typscript node
